content.text: Mr. RYAN of Ohio. Mr. Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.
content.speaker: Mr. RYAN of Ohio

content.text:
The motion was agreed to; accordingly (at 8 o'clock and 47 minutes 
p.m.), under its previous order, the House adjourned until tomorrow, 
Tuesday, November 14, 2017, at 10 a.m. for morning-hour debate.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
